job.title: Data Scientist
job.description:
Title: DBA / Data Scientist
Location: Remote (EST)
W2 only, C2C not eligible
Overview: Seeking someone with experience in: Regression modeling, Machine leaning (Text analytics nice to have), Python and / or R, and Tableau (nice to have).
Ideal Qualifications:
Data Science and Machine Learning Experience –
Needs to manipulate data and building Models
Python and/or R experience(someone with only SAS will not be a fit)
Regression Modeling
VBA development
Database – Oracle(preferred)
Data warehousing (Snowflake Preferred)
Text Analytics Experience – NLP (Natural Language Processing)
ODBC
SQL server
ETL
Tableau is nice to have
Excel is also preferred
